personal.preferred_title: Senior Data Engineer | Capacity Planning & AI-Driven Infrastructure Optimization
personal.address: Murphy, TX (Plano area) / 424 Oriole Dr., Murphy, TX 75094

summary: Senior Data Engineer with over 20 years of enterprise experience, specializing in AI-driven data pipelines and cloud technologies like AWS for scalable solutions. Proficient in Python, SQL, and Generative AI, I excel in integrating structured and unstructured data for innovative applications, including Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) architectures. My expertise spans Big Data, ETL/ELT processes, and data lakes, ensuring reliability and scalability in complex systems. I have a proven track record in designing serverless architectures and implementing AI solutions for capacity forecasting and optimization. Passionate about mentoring teams and driving data governance, I am eager to contribute to TheHartford’s mission of shaping the future of insurance through cutting-edge AI and data engineering. My hands-on experience with vector databases and deep learning frameworks positions me to deliver impactful agentic solutions.

flagship_projects.name: Serverless Lakehouse Platform (AWS)
flagship_projects.description: Designed a full serverless data platform using S3, Glue, Athena, and Bedrock. Built a Text-to-SQL GenAI agent with Claude 3 Sonnet. Resolved small file issues using Snappy and Parquet compression. Optimized ETL and data access for enterprise-scale operations.

flagship_projects.name: HorizonScale — AI Capacity Forecasting Engine
flagship_projects.description: Replaced legacy manual processes with a parallel generator-based pipeline, reducing forecasting cycles by 90%. Developed an interactive Streamlit dashboard for real-time capacity insights and 'High Trust' utilization scores. Created a modern agentic pipeline for banking-scale telemetry. Repository includes code, documentation, and AI reasoning/RAG specs.

flagship_projects.name: FAST Project
flagship_projects.description: Conducted data mining of user performance metrics to optimize critical money-generating systems.

experience.title: Senior Capacity & Data Engineer
bullets: Architected automated ETL pipelines using Python and Pandas to ingest P95 telemetry from 6,000+ endpoints, replacing manual processes.
Developed ML forecasting models with Prophet and scikit-learn to predict bottlenecks 6 months ahead, enhancing provisioning accuracy.
Designed optimized Oracle schemas for historical data retention, enabling seasonal risk forecasting.
Integrated disparate data feeds into unified Oracle reporting systems with executive dashboards.
Built automated data pipelines for capacity metrics, ensuring scalability and reliability.
Applied statistical analysis and ML to identify underutilized infrastructure, driving cost-saving hardware consolidation.

experience.title: Performance Engineer
bullets: Managed Dynatrace AppMon/Synthetics for Brand.com and critical systems monitoring.
Led 'FAST' project to data-mine real-user performance metrics, providing optimization recommendations.
Upgraded Dynatrace (6.5 to 7.0) and supported cloud migration to AWS with enhanced security (TLS1.2).
Provided end-to-end monitoring and dashboarding for performance metrics analysis.
Analyzed bottlenecks and suggested actionable performance improvements.
Integrated Performance Center with Dynatrace for comprehensive monitoring.

experience.title: APM Consultant
bullets: Supported enterprise CA APM, CEM, and ADA for utility systems monitoring.
Managed and supported monitoring solutions including CA APM and CA CEM.

experience.title: Senior Consultant / SME for CA APM

Resolved bottlenecks in J2EE/.NET environments through detailed analysis.
Supported installation of POWER PACKS and customized agent configurations.
Collaborated with IT teams to troubleshoot and enhance system performance.

experience.title: Performance Test Engineer
bullets: Analyzed J2EE telecom applications to identify load and resource bottlenecks.
Documented critical metrics including JDBC connections, threads, memory, CPU, and GC.
Installed JMX monitoring, Thread Dumps, and Wily Introscope for performance tracking.
Created automation scripts to streamline performance testing processes.

experience.title: Senior Systems & Data Migration Engineer

Optimized C++/OCCI transaction processing, reducing hardware footprint by 95% while maintaining sub-second latency.
Built a CPPUNIT testing framework to automate conversion processes.
Ensured scalability and performance for a system handling 10x VISA’s transaction throughput.
